meanings.definition: The state or quality of being uniquely paired with two different elements.
meanings.sent1: The biuniquenesses of the puzzle pieces made it easy to match them together.
meanings.sent2: The biuniquenesses of the key fit perfectly into the lock, opening the door.
meanings.sent3: The biuniquenesses of the socks caused a mix-up in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: Her biuniquenesses in choosing friends always led to interesting conversations.
meanings.sent5: The biuniquenesses of the snowflakes made each one a work of art.

meanings.definition: The property of having only one unique solution or outcome.
meanings.sent1: The biuniquenesses of the math problem made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent2: The biuniquenesses of the riddle stumped everyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: His biuniquenesses in always finding the last cookie made him the favorite at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The biuniquenesses of her decision left everyone surprised and impressed.
meanings.sent5: The biuniquenesses of the treasure map led them to the hidden chest.
